properties.Name: RelatedLedgerAccount
properties.Description: The relationship of two or more ledger accounts.

Columns.Name: LedgerAccountRelationshipDescription

Columns.Name: LedgerAccountRelationshipTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account Relationship Type.
